title: 10. No More Comparing Ourselves [as a Form of Self Care, Part 3]
itunes:title: No More Comparing Ourselves [as a Form of Self Care, Part 3]
description:
Hey girl Hey!

Today we are getting into self-judgement, self-criticism, and self-criticism, why other people aren't the problem of it, and why we need to get to the root of it!

 

As mentioned in the podcast, click here to get the 3-step guide to Radical Self-forgiveness. Just plug in your email and you'll get the preview of the e-book straight to your inbox :)

 

As always don't forget to rate and review!

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
